keyMoments.title: Arrives to Rescue Luffy at Marineford
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates arrive at the height of the Marineford War in their submarine to rescue Monkey D. Luffy and Jinbe.
keyMoments.significance: This daring rescue mission establishes the Heart Pirates' alliance with Luffy and demonstrates their courage in intervening in the war between the Marines and Whitebeard Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Successfully Escapes with Luffy and Jinbe
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates' submarine successfully submerges and escapes from Marineford with Luffy and Jinbe on board, navigating through Navy ships and Admiral attacks.
keyMoments.significance: This successful rescue ensures Luffy's survival and marks the beginning of a crucial alliance between Law and Luffy that shapes future arcs.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Marineford to End the War
keyMoments.description: The Red Hair Pirates arrive at Marineford with Shanks making a dramatic entrance to stop the war. Shanks blocks Akainu's attack and saves Koby's life.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most iconic crew entrances in the series. The Red Hair Pirates' arrival marks the end of the Marineford War and demonstrates their role as balance-keepers in the world.

keyMoments.title: Benn Beckman Threatens Admiral Kizaru
keyMoments.description: First Mate Benn Beckman holds Admiral Kizaru at gunpoint, demonstrating the crew's power by making an Admiral comply with his threat.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the incredible strength of the Red Hair Pirates. An Admiral stopping his attack out of respect for Beckman's threat demonstrates the crew's elite status among pirates.
